title: How to tell what i got from a Gift Code
body: So i recently got a code for a skin but when i redeemed it something else showed up in addition. I didnt really read it and just closed the window. But now i want to know what i got, is there a way to tell? without searching all my skins that is...

replies.body:
You can check your purchase history from the store by hitting the *Account* button (looks like a person in front of a cog), then hit **Purchase History**.

Let me know if this helped.
